select accom_seq.nextval from dual
insert into accommodation(ACCOM_NUM,ACCOM_MAX_CAP,ACCOM_ADDR,MEM_BRAND,IS_NUM, IMAGE_NUM,ACCOM_WEEK_PRICE,ACCOM_WKND_PRICE,ACCOM_CONTENT,MEM_ID) values(#{accomNum},#{accomMaxCap},#{accomAddr},#{memBrand},#{isNum}, image_seq.currval,#{accomWeekPrice},#{accomWkndPrice},#{accomContent},#{memId})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select /*+ index_desc(a accommodation_pk_accom_num)*/ a.accom_num , a.accom_addr , a.mem_brand, i.image_name , isl.is_num from accommodation a , image i, island isl where a.is_num = isl.is_num and isl.is_num=#{isNum} and a.image_num=i.image_num ) b where rownum<=#{endRow}) where rnum>=#{startRow}

select distinct a.accom_num ,a.accom_max_cap ,a.accom_addr ,a.mem_brand ,a.is_num ,a.image_num ,a.accom_week_price ,a.accom_wknd_price ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(accom_content, 1, 4000)) FROM accommodation where accom_num=#{accomNum})as accom_content ,m.mem_tel ,i.image_name ,isl.is_name ,st.stay_can_cap ,(select round(avg(s.star_score),1) from star s , accommodation a where a.accom_num=#{accomNum} and a.accom_num=s.accom_num group by a.accom_num)as star_score from accommodation a, member m, image i, island isl, star s, stay st where a.ACCOM_NUM=#{accomNum} and a.mem_brand=m.mem_brand and a.image_num=i.image_num and a.is_num=isl.is_num and a.accom_num=s.accom_num(+) and a.accom_num=st.accom_num
select mem_brand memBrand,mem_tel memTel,mem_name memName from member where mem_id=#{memId} and rownum=1
mapper.delete: delete from accommodation where accom_num=#{accomNum} and rownum=1
mapper.select: select ACCOM_NUM accomNum, ACCOM_MAX_CAP accomMaxCap,ACCOM_ADDR accomAddr,MEM_BRAND memBrand, IS_NUM isNum ,IMAGE_NUM imageNum,ACCOM_WEEK_PRICE accomWeekPrice,ACCOM_WKND_PRICE accomWkndPrice, ACCOM_CONTENT accomContent from accommodation

select pay.mem_id, m.mem_name, pay.pay_people_cnt, m.mem_tel from payment pay, package p, stay s, accommodation a, member m where m.mem_id=pay.mem_id and pay.pkg_num=p.pkg_num and p.stay_num=s.stay_num and a.accom_Num=s.accom_num and a.accom_num=#{accomNum}
select accom_num, mem_brand from accommodation where mem_id=#{memId}
